name: Sales Order Report
query:
SELECT
    ibg.owner AS "Initiator::200",
    ibg.name AS "Order ID::150",
    ibg.creation AS "Created Date:Date:100",
    ibg.country AS "Country::100",
    ibg.customer AS "Ship to Customer Name::150",
    ibg.bill_to_customer AS "Bill to Customer Name::150",
    ibg.sap_so_number AS "SAP SO No::100",
    i.fg_code AS "FG Code::100",
    i.qty_in_cases AS "QTY::100",
    i.billing_rate AS "Billing Rate:Float:100",
    i.units AS "Units::100",
    i.order_value AS "Order Value:Float:100",
    i.product_description AS "Product Description::200",
    oi.obd_sap_qty AS "Disp Qty::100",
    (oi.obd_sap_qty * i.billing_rate) AS "Disp Value::100",
    oi.pending_qty AS "Pending Qty::100",
    (i.order_value * oi.pending_qty) AS "Pending Value::100",
    obd.order_status AS "Order Status::200",
    CASE
        WHEN oi.rejected_qty > 0 THEN "Yes"
        ELSE "No"
    END AS "Short Closed::100",
    oi.creation AS "OBD Date:Date:100",
    (oi.obd_sap_qty / i.qty_in_cases) * 100 AS "Dispatch service level::100",
    DATEDIFF(oi.creation, ibg.creation) AS "Dispatch lead time in days::100"
FROM
    `tabIBG Order` AS ibg
JOIN
    `tabIBG Order Items` AS i ON ibg.name = i.parent
JOIN
    `tabOBD` AS obd ON ibg.name = obd.ibg_order_id
JOIN
    `tabOBD Items` AS oi ON obd.name = oi.parent
WHERE
    oi.fg_code = i.fg_code
    AND oi.sales_order_qty = i.qty_in_cases
    AND ibg.creation BETWEEN %(from_date)s AND %(to_date)s
